classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: STAT130, or STAT217.
Choose one of the following: PSY201, or PSY202.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, Lower-Division F, 4 units of GE Elective (lower or upper-division C or D), Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division B. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D (GEOG308) should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). NOTE: Some GEs may be fulfilled in concentration courses or minors. Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
